723
Radiology
Fig 16.3 ‘Bat’s wing’, peri-hilar pulmonary oedema indicating heart failure and ﬂ uid overload.
Courtesy of Dr Edmund Godfrey.
Fig 16.2 Lower lobe collapse (right lung). The right heart border is obscured. Volume loss in 
the right lower zone results in a hyper-expanded right upper lobe that is more radiolucent 
than the left upper lobe.
Courtesy of Dr Edmund Godfrey.
